TopicTitle: Any Antergos or Manjaro users out there?

Articles.Content:
Hey all, I have a new computer coming soon and have been considering a rolling release Linux as opposed to Ubuntu (which I've been using now for about 7 years), was curious about anyone's experience with either (and most importantly how well KSP runs on it )

The computer will have an i5, GTX950, and an SSD if any of this matters, plus I will use MATE as the DE. Thanks!

Edited May 4, 2016 by Waxing_Kibbous
